item.title: About
item.description: NoVault is a password utility that derives new unique passwords on the fly. Your team can use the same password for different resources. A resource can be a domain (example.com) or any string value. This combination allows you to create secure passwords that aren’t centrally stored. NoVault means no attack surface. Everything happens in your browser, nothing is sent to any server. Some websites have specific password requirements but NoVault might not meet all of those requirements.
